Theory: Tilda Swinton is actually always sleeping in a glass box and the world we know is just a dream she's having

I thought I was watching Tilda Swinton sleeping in a glass box but turns out it was just a dead moth in the porch light.

— Robin McCauley Lynch (@RobinMcCauley) March 25, 2013

internet, I‚Äôm confused. first we were ‚Äúyay Tilda!‚Äù and now we‚Äôre ‚Äúboo Tilda!‚Äù? tell me how to feel, internet.

Not a day goes by that I don't think of Pedro. That's his legacy. that we remember.
We honor those we love by remembering them.

— Todd VanDerWerff (@tvoti) March 24, 2013

— Louis Peitzman (@LouisPeitzman) March 25, 2013
